title: Champion Mastery Grades not Loading?
body:
Ever since the latest patch, champion mastery grades haven't been loading for me at the end of the game.

I'd wait like 10 minutes and still nothing. Strangely enough, whenever I duo with a friend, they too have the same issue (but not when they're not playing with me) so for whatever reason, my account isn't letting me, or my friends have our grades loaded?

Solo queue is the same, no grade. Just keeps loading and loading.

replies.body: This is more a bug than it is a technical issue. You might want to head over to the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
